title: Friends list gone
body:
So, I logged in last week to find that my in-client friends list is completely gone. I thought the issue might resolve itself by logging out and logging back in, to no avail. The issue has not been resolved with the 6.18 patch.

Pretty much the only reason I play LoL these days is to enjoy a game with friends, which is hard to do when I can't tell if anyone is online.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

I don't know. I sent in a support ticket with the same information as above, and apparently I'm now permanently banned and have to send in a support ticket about recovering my account. I have no clue what's going on, or why sending in a support ticket resulted in a ban, or how a permanent ban is supposed to help solve the issue.

Hey there,

Sounds to me like your account was compromised, the first step support will take if an account has been compromised is to issue a permanent ban on the account to prevent unauthorised use.

Please continue your correspondence with player support regarding this.

Are you connected to chat? If you are having a connection issue that prevents you from connecting to the chat server, the entire social window pane on the bottom right will be gone, and on the left there will be a button that says "Reconnect to Chat" which you'll want to press.

If you're just having a connection issue let us know.
No connection issue, my friend's list is simply empty. Like someone had come in and deleted everyone from the list. There aren't any offline friends either.
